column5: just a heads up to any of you who might be heading over to the states for some shopping or what not I was at Gander Mountain last week and they have Shimano Stradic 2500 MGFB on sale for 129.99 which is like $100 off of retail I picked one up , Not sure how long the sale is on though so i wouldnt make a special trip for it or call ahead first maybe just though id pass on a deal that i found Cheers
